      • saveAlarm

        @PostMapping(path="/new")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String saveAlarm(@RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String timeOfDay,
                                                                             @RequestParam
                                                                             java.lang.String isEnabled)
        method that acts as a http post request that saves a user's alarm with the time of day and whether or not it's active.
        Parameters:
        timeOfDay - string indicating the time of day of the alarm
        isEnabled - string is either true for enabled or false for disabled
        Returns:
        string response to indicate a successful save

public java.util.List<UserAlarms> getAllUserAlarms()
        method that acts as a http get request that returns a list of all the alarms in the database
        Returns:
        list of all alarms in database
